text.div:
US Core Provenance Participant Type Codes

The type of participation a provenance agent played for a given target.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/CodeSystem/us-core-provenance-participant-type
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/provenance-participant-type

name: USCoreProvenancePaticipantTypeCodes
title: US Core Provenance Participant Type Codes
description: The type of participation a provenance agent played for a given target.
purpose: So API consumers can identify the provenance participant type.
